episodes.original_body:
Case: Lori-House-MVA-11-19-2025
Client: Lori House

__CLIENT CONTACT__
__Details:__ 11/19/2025
15th and Hill
4 way stop, client was on 15th going north, defendant was on hill going west, it was her turn to go and she’s in the middle of the intersection when she was t-boned in back passenger side. Hit and run

LMPD

7/4/1976
SSN: 406-21-7633PH: 502-418-0557

PIP libery Mutual

No treatment to date

Injuries: mid and lower back. Some sciatica pain.

1502 W Muhammed Ali blvd
Apt 2
40203 
__Person Making Contact:__ Justin
__Date & Time__: November 21 2025
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on November 19, 2025 with Lori House regarding a motor vehicle accident (MVA) at the four-way intersection of 15th Street and Hill. Lori was northbound on 15th at the four-way stop when the defendant, traveling west on Hill, was in the intersection and Lori, having the right of way, was in the middle of the intersection when she was T-boned on the back passenger side. The other vehicle then fled the scene, resulting in a hit-and-run. The incident was reported to LMPD.

Client details and current status: Date of birth is July 4, 1976; SSN 406-21-7633; phone 502-418-0557. Current address: 1502 W Muhammed Ali blvd Apt 2 40203. PIP carrier is libery Mutual. The client reports no treatment to date. Injuries noted are mid and lower back with some sciatica pain. The person making contact was Justin, on November 21, 2025.
episodes.author: Filevine Integration

about.relevance: police department the incident was reported to

episodes.original_body:
Case: Lori-House-MVA-11-19-2025
Client: Lori House

**FILE ORGANIZATION COMPLETED**

Completed systematic case file organization using 8-bucket directory system with filename bias elimination protocol.

**Documents Processed:**
- Client Intake Package (12 pages) - includes Non-Solicitation Affidavit, Personal Injury Fee Agreement, and HIPAA Medical Authorization
- Intake Verification Document (Vinesign confirmation)

**Files Organized:**
1. 2025-11-21_Client_Intake_Package_Lori_House.pdf/.md → Client/Intake_Documents/
2. 2025-11-21_Intake_Verification_Lori_House.pdf/.md → Client/Intake_Documents/

**Key Information Extracted:**
- Fee Agreement: 33.36% pre-suit, 40% post-suit (signed 11/21/2025)
- Client contact verified: lohouse222@gmail.com, (502) 418-0557
- HIPAA authorization in place for medical records requests
- All intake documents properly executed via Vinesign

**File Structure:**
All intake documents now properly categorized in Client/Intake_Documents/ with standardized naming convention (YYYY-MM-DD_Document_Type_Client_Name format).

Case file is now organized and ready for active case management.
episodes.natural_language:
On November 19, 2025, the Lori House motor vehicle accident case (Lori-House-MVA-11-19-2025) was organized and prepared for active case management. The file organization has been completed using an eight-bucket directory system with a filename bias elimination protocol to ensure consistent, neutral labeling.

Documents processed include the Client Intake Package, a 12-page packet that contains a Non-Solicitation Affidavit, a Personal Injury Fee Agreement, and a HIPAA Medical Authorization, as well as the Intake Verification Document (Vinesign confirmation). The two processed files are 2025-11-21_Client_Intake_Package_Lori_House.pdf/.md and 2025-11-21_Intake_Verification_Lori_House.pdf/.md, both of which have been placed in the Client/Intake_Documents/ folder.

Key information extracted includes the fee agreement: 33.36% pre-suit and 40% post-suit, signed on November 21, 2025; client contact verified as lohouse222@gmail.com and (502) 418-0557; a HIPAA authorization is in place for medical records requests; and all intake documents were properly executed via Vinesign.

The file structure now standardizes intake documents in Client/Intake_Documents/ using the naming convention YYYY-MM-DD_Document_Type_Client_Name. Overall, the case file is organized and ready for active case management.
episodes.author: Roscoe (AI Paralegal)
